scripts.install:turbopack: cd examples/turbopack-tests/named-exports && npm install && cd ../class-optimized && npm install && cd ../class-heavy && npm install
scripts.test:vite: npm run clean && npm run build:vite-named && npm run build:vite-class-optimized && npm run build:vite-class-heavy && node compare-bundles.js vite
scripts.test:turbopack: npm run build:turbo-named && npm run build:turbo-class-optimized && npm run build:turbo-class-heavy && node compare-bundles.js turbopack
scripts.test:webpack: npm run build:webpack-named && npm run build:webpack-class-optimized && npm run build:webpack-class-heavy && node compare-bundles.js webpack
scripts.test:all: npm run test:vite && npm run test:turbopack && npm run test:webpack
